title: Forgot Password
body: Hello, so i'm having some issues, with resetting my password, the email wont send to my email and i know i changed my password to my smurf account like a month or 2 ago, (Twisted Identity) i just want to get on my account.. and i cant seem to remember my password again..

replies.body: For issues like this where we'd have to confirm ownership of the account, we'd ask that you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can 1) Make sure you're you and 2) make sure that you're receiving your password :)
